content: this is a **mystery pattern for the solid socks group for the months of september and october 2025 ** the group for the mystery can be found here 1 clues will be released on september 1 8 15 and 22 2025 you will need to return here each week to collect the next clue through september 2025 to fit foot circumference with negative ease 7 8 9 /18 20 23 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/solidsocks
